bibl.title: A Lost Law-Code Rediscovered? The Fragmenta Londiniensia Anteiustiniana.
bibl.note: Brief description of 17 parchment fragments recovered from a binding. Headings to imperial constitutions. Rests of a late Roman legal work in codex form (Gregorian Code?), AD 400-500.
bibl.seg: Corcoran Simon and Benet Salway, A Lost Law-Code Rediscovered? The Fragmenta Londiniensia Anteiustiniana.
Brief description of 17 parchment fragments recovered from a binding. Headings to imperial constitutions. Rests of a late Roman legal work in codex form (Gregorian Code?), AD 400-500.
